titleStmt.title: A memorial of Gods judgments, spiritual and temporal, or, Sermons to call to remembrance first preached and now published for publick benefit / by Nic. Lockier ...
titleStmt.author: Lockyer, Nicholas, 1611-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Dorman Newman, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Half-title page: The remedie of natural corruption, being a sermon on Rom. vii. xxv.
Half-title page: The description of a friend, being a sermon on Prov. 17.17.
